fields.name: Ability:
fields.value: Send a contract to a person

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: You can send a contract to a person, the following night they will get a notification asking if they want to join the feudal system. If they accept, they will keep their role and their alignment will always remain the same, even if a role would cause you to change (Meaning other converts will kill you if applicable). You can only send out 3 contracts. Cannot send out contracts with 4 feudal members.
